briefTitle: Autologous Nerve Graft Breast Reconstruction Neurotization
officialTitle: Breast Neurotization During Breast Reconstruction Enhances Quality of Life
conditions: Breast Reconstruction, Breast Cancer Patients, Nipple-sparing Mastectomy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient who receive breast reconstruction
* Patient who is willing to fill in the questionnaire

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patient who receive breast reconstruction for the reason other than breast cancer
